title: RPG Medieval Fantasy Gamepack Music
description: This package is excellent for iconic areas of medieval fantasy RPG, as well as action and adventure games.
longDescription:
This pack contains nine (9) epic, dramatic, and cinematic, fully-orchestrated audio tracks. Luscious string sections, powerful brass, brilliant woodwinds, and commanding percussion complete this pack. Synthesizers, choir sections, individual vocals, voice effects in all ranges, and many ethnic and medieval folk instruments are also included to manufacture a very realistic experience!


This package is excellent for iconic areas of medieval fantasy RPG, as well as action and adventure games, including, but not limited to: battle scenes, boss battles, caves, dungeons, forests, villages/towns, castles, mountains, temples, frost regions, deserts, taverns, and merchant scenes.


• Each track is designed to be looped indefinitely as per your gameplay demands. 

• All audio files are manufactured in stereo and in WAV format for maximum production and clarity.

• All tracks were professionally composed, performed, mixed, and mastered at 44.1k and 16-bit PCM sample rates. 

• The stems from each track are also included for further customization. 

• All the tracks in this pack feature motivic unity and may move seamlessly from one to another in actual gameplay.


Track List:

1. Winter Cave (4:00)

2. Forest Song (2:27)

3. Desert Song (2:08)

4. Desert Boss Battle (1:01)

5. Tavern Song (1:36)

6. Plains & Villages (9:23)

7. Dwarves Working in the Mountain (1:56)

8. Druid Temple Song (3:36)

9. Dungeons and Dark Forests (8:28)


The entire pack may be listened to here: https://soundcloud.com/user-121472938


*All tracks were composed and produced by me: Scott Lyle, and credits in your projects would be greatly appreciated! Please let me know what projects you use my compositions in, so I can share them with others.


If you have any questions, would prefer to have these tracks in other audio formats, or would be interested to commission me to compose custom music for your project, please reach out to me at: squaresunmusic@gmail.com

Features:

• Each track is designed to be looped indefinitely as per your gameplay demands. 

• All audio files are manufactured in stereo and in WAV format for maximum production and clarity.

• All tracks were professionally composed, performed, mixed, and mastered at 44.1kHz and 16-bit PCM sample rates. 

• The stems from each track are also included for further customization.

Details:

Format: Stereo WAV files at 44.1kHz, 16-bit

Number of audio WAV Tracks: 133

Number of cues: 133
